name: "Gordo" Andrade
effect: Gordo may use a second weapon during a Shootout.

name: A Secret Tunnel
effect: Noon: Choose two deeds you own. There is a secret tunnel between those two deeds and they are considered "adjacent" whenever you wish for the rest of the game.

name: Ace in the Hole
effect: Reaction: Play after Draw Hands have been revealed for any draw. You may discard one of your cards and replace it with either a card from your Play Hand or the top card from your deck.

name: Ambush
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and assemble a posse to ace any dude in play. If the job is successful, the target is aced. All of the dudes in your posse become Wanted unless the target was Wanted.

name: Austin Stoker
effect: Shootout: All Terrors in this Shootout with a Bullet Rating below 3 have their rating reduced to zero.

name: Big Jake…
effect: The cost to bring Jake into play from your Play Hand and his upkeep are reduced by one if you have Scooter in play. Reaction: Boot Jake immediately before the upkeep phase to reduce the production of one strike to zero for this turn.

name: Bob's Fix-it Shop
effect: Private. Controller Reaction: Boot the Fix-it Shop when one of your Gadgets is being aced to place it in your Play Hand. Controller Reaction: Boot the Fix-it Shop when one of your goods is being aced to place it in your Discard pile.

name: Bomb
effect: Noon: Boot this dude and leave the Bomb on this deed. Any dude may, as a Noon job, ace this card. If the Bomb is still on the deed after nightfall, the deed is aced.

name: Dr. Reginald Branson
effect: Reaction: Boot Dr. Branson when a dude is aced in a Shootout when the difference in Draw Hands was less than 2 Ranks and you have at least one other dude at that location. Pull: If the value is less than the dude's value, the dude survives and goes to your home booted.

name: Equipment Shop
effect: Private. All of your strikes produce 1 extra ghost rock.

name: Ezzie
effect: The Harrowed Harlot. Noon: Boot Ezzie and target a dude. That dude's Controller performs three Pulls: if all three pulls are higher than the dude's value, the dude is aced. If the dude's controller cannot make three pulls, any pulls the controller cannot make are considered successful.

name: Flamethrower
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 You must pay one ghost rock to use this weapon in a Shootout. This dude is a Stud in a Shootout. If a dude carrying the flamethrower is aced in a Shootout, Pull: If it is odd, then the flamethrower explodes, acing two more of your dudes in this fight (your choice).

name: Flint Parker
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Friends in High Places
effect: Noon: Boot one or more of your dudes who have a combined Influence greater than the number of Control Points provided by the deed they are in. You control this deed until after nightfall, regardless of other Players' Influence totals.

name: Gatling Gun
effect: Weapon. The Gatling Gun cannot be used when this dude has moved to a different location this turn.

name: Gerald Klippstein
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Shootout: Boot Klippstein to move him and any of your dudes at his location into the Shootout's location and join them with either posse.

name: Get a Rope
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. Boot one of your dudes and call out any one of that Player's dudes for a Shootout. This Shootout cannot be refused, and no other dudes may join the Shootout. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Get on Your Feet!
effect: Noon Pull: Target a booted dude. If the pull is equal to or greater than the value of the targeted dude, unboot the dude. Only one Get On Your Feet can be played per turn by each Player.

name: Government Audit
effect: After upkeep this turn, all Players must pay 1 ghost rock for each deed they control up to the total ghost rock in their Vault.

name: Gunther Hapworth
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Noon: Boot Gunther at any location and pay 1 Ghost Rock. Give him a +3 Bullet Stud bonus until the end of next turn that is in effect whenever he is at a location you control.

name: Hell's End Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Holy Wheel Gun
effect: Mystical. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:6 If you ace a Harrowed dude in a Shootout with the Holy Wheel Gun, they are aced as if they were not Harrowed. Noon: Boot this dude to ace a Terror at this location.

name: Howard Findley
effect: While you have Howard Findley in play, your strikes cost 1 less ghost rock to put into play and they produce 1 additional ghost rock per turn.

name: Ignacio's Exotics
effect: Private. All Mystical goods you bring into play cost 2 less ghost rock.

name: It Was a Mountain Lion
effect: Pull: The dude or dudes in play whose value is closest to the pull gets aced.

name: Jail Break
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your dudes and gather a posse of at least one other dude to damage a deed. If the job is successful, the deed is worth 1 fewer Control Point, produces 2 fewer ghost rock per turn, and loses any special actions (minimum zero for each). These changes are permanent.

name: Jim MacNeil
effect: Shootout: Boot MacNeil to replace any Sweetrock dude in a Shootout.

name: Judge Henry Warwick
effect: Noon Job: Boot Warwick to assemble a posse to ace any Wanted dude in play. Warwick must be in the posse.

name: Max Baine
effect: Non-Unique.

name: One Eyed Ike's Weapons Locker
effect: Public. A dude occupying Ike's can only be called out by Harrowed dudes. Weapons the Controller is bringing into play have their cost reduced by two.

name: Orphanage
effect: Private. Government. Controller Reaction: Boot the Orphanage at the beginning of the upkeep phase to double the ghost rock production of one strike deed this turn (after other bonuses).

name: Overtime
effect: Reaction: Play before the upkeep phase to increase the ghost rock production of all your ghost rock-producing deeds by one. On your next turn, you gain no ghost rock from your deeds.

name: Pinned Down
effect: Shootout: Target a booted dude in the opposing posse. That dude may not be the shooter if another dude can be; the dude does not provide a one-card Draw or Stud bonus to the shooter.

name: Pistol Whip
effect: Shootout: Send one of the opponent's dudes in this fight home, booted. Give a -1 Bullet (minimum zero) to one of your dudes in this fight for the rest of the Shootout.

name: Red Crow
effect: Non-Unique.

name: Red Hill Hotel
effect: Public. Controller Reaction: Boot the Hotel at the beginning of the upkeep phase to negate the upkeep cost of any dude you control.

name: Refuse to Fall
effect: Reaction: Play when your last dude is being aced in a Shootout. If the dude has Influence greater than zero, reduce it by one permanently instead of acing the dude: you do not lose your last dude in this round. This dude is aced after the Shootout.

name: Reverend Simon MacPherson
effect: Non-Unique. Harrowed dudes may not call MacPherson out. Shootout: Boot MacPherson to reduce the Bullet Rating of all Terrors in this Shootout to zero.

name: Robert Northrop
effect: Any strike where Northrop is present produces double its normal ghost rock when Northrop is unbooted.

name: Rooftop Sniper
effect: Shootout: Before this Shootout continues, there is a Shootout between one of your unbooted dudes who is adjacent but not in the Shootout and any one enemy dude who is in this Shootout. No other dudes may enter this new Shootout.

name: Scooter's Lift Winch
effect: Private. The ghost rock cost of the Lift winch is reduced to zero if you have Scooter in play. The Lift Winch is considered adjacent to any deed with a Winch token. Controller Noon: Boot the Lift Winch and pay 2 ghost rock to place a Winch token on an out of town deed you own.

name: Sir Whitmore
effect: Non-Unique. Huckster:0 Noon: Boot Sir Whitmore and pay 1 ghost rock to look at a Player's Play Hand.

name: Smiley's Shaft
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Sweetrock
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:20 You cannot put into play or take control of a Dude from another Outfit if you already control a non-Sweetrock, non-Drifter Dude. You have one additional Control Point for each strike that you control that produces more than 5 ghost rock per turn. When playing lowball during the gambling phase, you draw and discard an additional card.

name: The Docks
effect: Private. The cost of the Docks is decreased by two if you have Big Jake in play. The Docks produce ghost rock equal to the number of strikes in play.

name: The Fair Comes to Town
effect: Every dude with Influence greater than one is booted. Ace this card.

name: The Good Doctor
effect: Private. Controller Reaction: Boot the Doctor when a dude has just been aced, pay 2 ghost rock, and Pull: Odd means the dude does not get aced and is sent home booted, instead. Even or face card means he is aced, normally. Joker means he is Harrowed and sent home booted.

name: The Temperance Army
effect: Boot all saloons and brothels. These deeds do not produce ghost rock this turn and may not produce any actions.

name: The Twitch
effect: If The Twitch is aced during a shootout, send him home booted instead of to Boot Hill, and permanently reduce his printed Bullet rating by 1. If his printed Bullet rating is ever permanently reduced to 0, The Twitch is removed from play and cannot return.

name: Tom O'Reilly
effect: Tom's upkeep is reduced by one for every dude in Boot Hill.

name: Top of the World Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: …And Scooter
effect: The cost to bring Scooter into play from your Play Hand and his upkeep are reduced by one if you have Big Jake in play.
